title: Navalny appears in court for first time since ending hunger strike, saying 'I'm just an awful skeleton'
content:
1. Navalny appears in court for first time since ending hunger strike, saying 'I'm just an awful skeleton'  CNN
  2. Top ally announces closing Navalny's offices amid crackdown  Yahoo News
  3. Alexei Navalny looks gaunt as he appears in court after hunger strike  The Guardian
  4. Kremlin critic Navalny looks thin and drained after hunger strike  Reuters
  5. Alexei Navalny makes first court appearance since ending hunger strike (2) | AFP  AFP News Agency
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
